thread.section_title: MyComicShop Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of MyComicShop | mycomicshop.com
thread.title: Ron Chmiel

author: Ron Chmiel
title: Ron Chmiel
text: I have bought several higher end comics from MCS and was very pleased. The books arrived promptly and well packaged. I have also sold several hundred comics and payments come weekly. The pricing "My Commissions" site is quite fun to navigate and use. Suggested pricing and links to GPA are incorporated into each comic listing to allow you to find that perfect sales point. I am quite pleased to have chosen MyComicShop!
